LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtype.name: LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtype
LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtype.description: Represents a subtype of a fixed-model non-qualifying loyalty program currency.

CostPerUnit.description: Monetary value of each unit of the loyalty program currency subtype.

Description.description: Description of the loyalty program currency subtype.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the loyalty program currency subtype is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: Required. The fixed-model non-qualifying loyalty program currency associated with the loyalty program currency subtype.

Name.description: Required. The name of the loyalty program currency subtype.

UsagePriorityNumber.description: Required. The usage priority number of the loyalty program currency subtype. The usage priority number decides the order in which the points are redeemed across currency subtypes when multiple currency subtypes expire on the same date.
